title: DirectX Errors! D:
body: So I've been trying to get in game for the past couple days and it continues to give me the directx error where I can't get into the loading screen. I have checked and I am on the directx 12 and all of my stuff is up to date. Help D:

replies.body:
Something might still be failing to render the game and resulting in that error, even though you have Directx installed.  Try out the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure your game files and drivers are in good shape.

Just in case, it also wouldn't hurt to run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide just in case your OS is blocking some of your game data to be read.

Let me know how that goes for you!
Contacting Riot Support would be best.
